message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I really think this product is worth more than $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110.
